Class orderMenuController

java.lang.Object
orderMenuController
public class orderMenuController extends Object
Class Displaying the list of categories of beverages.

This class is responsible for displaying the four types of beverages

  1. Milky Beverage
  2. Fresh Brew Beverage
  3. Fruity Beverage
  4. Ice Blended Beverage

      public orderMenuController()

  • Method Details

    • setOrder

      public void setOrder(Order order)

      This method gets the current Order Object to ensure that the selected drink for this page is associated with the correct/current order

      Parameters:
      order - the current Order Object that comes from the previous "page"

    • handleSwitchToMilkyBevView

      public void handleSwitchToMilkyBevView()
      Button action for a milky beverage and naviagtes the user to a page listing all milky beverages.

      This method switches scene to a page listing all of the milky beverages so that the user can find the specific milky beverage drink. This method will also call the milkyBeverageController setOrder() function to pass through the current Order object.

    • handleSwitchToFreshBrewView

      public void handleSwitchToFreshBrewView()
      Button action for a fresh brew beverage and navigates the user to a page listing all fresh brew beverages.

      This method switches scene to a page listing all of the fresh brew beverages so that the user can find the specific fresh brew beverage drink. This method will also call the freshBrewController setOrder() function to pass through the current Order object.

    • handleSwitchToFruityBevView

      public void handleSwitchToFruityBevView()
      Button action for a fruity beverage and navigates the user to a page listing all fruity beverages.

      This method switches scene to a page listing all of the fruity beverages so that the user can find the specific fruity beverage drink. This method will also call the fruityBevController setOrder() function to pass through the current Order object.

    • actionCancelOrderButton

      public void actionCancelOrderButton()
      BUtton action to cancel and order

      This method does not create an order object, there for cancelling an order, and switches scene back to the customer screen.

    • handleSwitchToIceBlendedView

      public void handleSwitchToIceBlendedView()
      Button action for ice belended beverages and navigates the user to a page listing all fruity beverages.

      This method switches scene to a page listing all of the ice blended beverages so that the user can find the specific ice blended beverage drink. This method will also call the iceBlendedController setOrder() function to pass through the current Order object.

    • actionViewOrderButton

      public void actionViewOrderButton()
      Button action to view the order summary

      This method switches to the orderSummary page to dispaly a list of drinks in the order and the price of the drinks.
